Package com.hexaware.dao.service

Interface ICustomerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerServiceImpl
public interface ICustomerService
The ICustomerService interface provides methods for interacting with the Customer entity. This interface defines operations such as retrieving customer information by ID or username, registering a new customer, updating existing customer details, and deleting a customer.

  • Method Details

    • getCustomerByID

      Customer getCustomerByID(int customerID)
      Retrieves customer information by ID.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The unique identifier of the customer.
      Returns:
      The Customer object corresponding to the customer ID, or null if not found.

    • getCustomerByIDWithoutReturnType

      void getCustomerByIDWithoutReturnType(int customerID)

    • getCustomerByUsername

      Customer getCustomerByUsername(String userName)
      Retrieves customer information by username.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the customer.
      Returns:
      The Customer object corresponding to the username, or null if not found.

    • getCustomerByUsernameWithoutReturnType

      void getCustomerByUsernameWithoutReturnType(String userName)

    • registerCustomer

      void registerCustomer(Customer customer)
      Registers a new customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object containing the details of the new customer to be registered.

    • updateCustomer

      void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Updates existing customer details.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object containing the updated details of the customer.

    • deleteCustomer

      void deleteCustomer(int customerID)
      Deletes a customer by ID.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The unique identifier of the customer to be deleted.

    • getCustomerDetailsAndTheirReservationStatus

      void getCustomerDetailsAndTheirReservationStatus()
      Retrieves the details of customers along with their reservation status. This method should be implemented by concrete classes to provide the functionality of retrieving customer details and their reservation status.
